movies.title: Some Other Stories
movies.plot: The film is a high-concept project with five stories exploring the themes of motherhood and pregnancy, directed by women filmmakers from five former Yugoslav republics. "Croatian Story" follows an anguished painter who must decide whether or not to keep one of her unborn twins, diagnosed with Down syndrome. "Serbian Story" finds an expectant mother in the same emergency room with a charming killer. "Bosnia-Herzegovina Story" centers on a financially strapped Sarajevo family whose son's lover is pregnant. "Macedonian Story" unfolds in a clinic where a drug addict struggles to keep her baby, and "Slovenian Story" ends the omnibus on a humorous note with a nun who finds her own way to immaculate conception.
movies.simplePlot: The film is a high-concept project with five stories exploring the themes of motherhood and pregnancy, directed by women filmmakers from five former Yugoslav republics. "Croatian Story" ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Siroki Brijeg, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Yugoslavia
biography.bio: Goran Bogdan was born on October 2, 1980 in Siroki Brijeg, Bosnia and Hercegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and writer, known for Number 55 (2014), Sonja and the Bull (2012) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Goran Bogdan

biography.bio: Nera Stipicevic is a Croatian stage and film actress, as well as a singer. She was born at the Croatian coast in the town of Makarska. She graduated from the Academy of Dramatic Arts in Zagreb in 2010. She performed in the Croatian National Theater in their 2007 rendition of "The Threepenny Opera" by Bertold Brecht. In 2008 she played the role of Anka Prpalo in the play "Fantazija", in the Croatian National Theater Sibenik, for which she was nominated for the best young operetta/musical actress at the Croatian annual drama awards in 2008. She co-wrote the music for that play. She also played in the Croatian National Theater 2008 rendition of "They Shoot Horses, Don't They?" by Horace McCoy, playing the role of Lily Bacon, for which she was nominated for the best young drama actress at the Croatian annual drama rewards in 2009. In 2010 she played Sonja, the main role in the Croatian story of the omnibus Some Other Stories. Same year she won the Croatian version of Dancing with the Stars.
biography.name: Nera Stipicevic

biography.bio: Mirela Brekalo was born on February 6, 1956 in Zagreb, Croatia. She is an actress, known for Ruza vjetrova (2011), Nasi i vasi (2000) and These Are the Rules (2014). She has been married to Sinisa Popovic since 1985. They have one child.
biography.name: Mirela Brekalo

biography.bio: Anita Matic was born in Zagreb in 1975. Graduated in acting from the Academy of Dramatic Arts in Zagreb. She is a winner of the Rektor's Prize for her part in James Goldman's Lav u zimi, directed by Josko Juvancic. After completing her education, she joined the Kerempuh Satirical Theatre. She has performed in many plays including: Nemres pobjeci od nedjelje, Cabaret and The Vagina monolgues. She has guest starred with other theatre companies such as Mala scena, ZKM, GK Komedija, HNK and in Virovitica Theatre Company. She has also acted in film, her most significant role being that of Nina in a TV film Pet minuta njeznosti.
biography.name: Anita Matic

biography.bio: Otokar Levaj was born on April 17, 1943 in Zagreb, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Dolina sunca (2009), Cesalj (1983) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Otokar Levaj

biography.bio: Marija Kohn was born on August 7, 1934 in Lopud, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Larin izbor (2011), Le choix de Luna (2010) and Maitre de son corps (1957).
biography.name: Marija Kohn

biography.bio: Mladen Kovacic was born on September 2, 1983 in Virovitica, Croatia. He is an actor, known for Tajne (2013), The Show Must Go On (2010) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Mladen Kovacic

biography.bio: Ljubica Cuca is an actress, known for Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Ljubica Cuca

biography.bio: Ranko Cuca is an actor, known for Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Ranko Cuca

biography.bio: Marko Sertic is an actor, known for Some Other Stories (2010) and Sve ce biti dobro (2008).
biography.name: Marko Sertic

biography.bio: Edvin Liveric was born on November 20, 1970 in Rijeka, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Don't Give Up, Nina (2007), Some Other Stories (2010) and The Horseman (2003).
biography.name: Edvin Liveric

biography.bio: Matea Elezovic was born on September 6, 1985 in Zagreb, Croatia. She is an actress, known for Ruza vjetrova (2011), The Dark (2011) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Matea Elezovic

biography.bio: Sanja Hrenar was born on May 2, 1980 in Zagreb, Croatia/Hrvatska. She is an actress, known for Forest Creatures (2010), Celestial Body (2000) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Sanja Hrenar

biography.bio: Darko Janes was born on July 19, 1957 in Zagreb, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Neighbors Forever (2007), Love in Offside (2005) and Sustanar (1982).
biography.name: Darko Janes

biography.bio: Maja Katic was born on April 22, 1982 in Zagreb, Croatia. She is an actress, known for Ponos Ratkajevih (2007), Once... (2004) and Some Other Stories (2010).
biography.name: Maja Katic
